summary: Document management application for Vial Traite Service with technical folder organization, client file management, and custom branding
architectural_notes: Frontend: React + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS for UI
Backend: Motoko on Internet Computer for secure storage
Authentication: Internet Identity (passkeys, Google, Apple, Microsoft)
Color palette: Blue #0066CC (primary), Green lime #99CC33, Orange #FF9933
Document management with hierarchical folder structure
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Vial Traite Service logo with blue text, orange leaf accents, lime green circular border, and blue cow illustration on transparent background (vial-traite-logo.dim_400x200.png)

existing_features.title: Replace the application logo with the provided Vial Traite Service logo (showing blue text, orange leaves, green circular border, and blue cow illustration)
Apply the Vial Traite Service brand color palette throughout the application UI: primary blue (#0066CC), lime green (#99CC33), and orange (#FF9933) from the logo
Implement an in-app document viewer with zoom and image enlargement capabilities for technical folder documents
Enable users to create, rename, and organize subfolders within the technical folder to categorize documents by theme
Implement drag-and-drop functionality to move folders and files within the technical folder structure
Extend technical folder support to handle all file formats including images, PDFs, Word documents, Excel spreadsheets, and other common document types
Add the same document viewer with zoom and enlargement capabilities to client intervention files

new_feature_requests.summary: Document viewer with zoom and image enlargement functionality
Create and rename folders and subfolders with drag-and-drop organization
Multi-format file support (images, PDF, Word, Excel, etc.)
Custom branding with Vial Traite Service logo and color scheme
Client file management integrated with intervention records
